fr:title.text: Foundations of Reinforcement Learning and Interactive Decision Making

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Foundations of Reinforcement Learning and Interactive Decision Making
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: @misc{fosterFoundationsReinforcementLearning2023, title = {Foundations of {{Reinforcement Learning}} and {{Interactive Decision Making}}}, author = {Foster, Dylan J. and Rakhlin, Alexander}, year = {2023}, doi = {10.48550/arXiv.2312.16730}, urldate = {2025-01-23}, number = {arXiv:2312.16730}, publisher = {arXiv}, file = {/home/kellen/Zotero/storage/YCJRGLTL/Foster and Rakhlin - 2023 - Foundations of Reinforcement Learning and Interactive Decision Making.pdf}, keywords = {Computer Science - Machine Learning,Mathematics - Optimization and Control,Mathematics - Statistics Theory,Statistics - Machine Learning,Statistics - Statistics Theory}, langid = {english}, archiveprefix = {arXiv}, abstract = {These lecture notes give a statistical perspective on the foundations of reinforcement learning and interactive decision making. We present a unifying framework for addressing the exploration-exploitation dilemma using frequentist and Bayesian approaches, with connections and parallels between supervised learning/estimation and decision making as an overarching theme. Special attention is paid to function approximation and flexible model classes such as neural networks. Topics covered include multi-armed and contextual bandits, structured bandits, and reinforcement learning with high-dimensional feedback.}, primaryclass = {cs}, eprint = {2312.16730}, month = {December} }
